column2: Your hero will convert the opposing hero to join your cause.
Your hero will join the army in battle and enhance the force on the campaign map.
Your hero will cause damage to the opposing army or hinder their effectiveness on the campaign map.
Your hero will impede the opposing settlement's effectiveness.
Your hero will use their skills to assist the workings of the local province.
Your hero will assassinate the opposing character.
Your hero will use their skills to diminish the workings of the opposing province.
